SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class LobbyGameListsController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.LobbyGameListsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameList, LobbyGameListsController, MalevolentPlayerManager, Serializable, Remote
public class LobbyGameListsController extends Object implements LobbyGameListsController
This class is the controller that handles the reception of the clients. It manages list of lobbies, the list of games, the join and leave of the players, the creation and destruction of the lobbies and the games.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • LobbyGameListsController

      public LobbyGameListsController()
      Constructor of the class. It schedules a periodic task to refresh the list of games, removing the expired games from the list.

  • Method Details

    • login

      public boolean login(String nickname, ViewInterface view, GameControllerReceiver controllerReceiver)
      Method that handles the login of a player. It checks if the nickname is valid, depending on the regex in the Configs class. If it is not valid, it sends an error message to the client and re-prompts the login form. If the nickname is already taken, it sends an error message to the client and re-prompts the login form. If the nickname is in a gameParty, it sets the gameController of the player to the gameController and re-joins the game. Otherwise, it adds the player to the lobbyList updates the lightModel with the list of all opened lobbies and prompts the joinLobby view
      Specified by:
      login in interface LobbyGameListsController
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname chosen by the player
      view - the view of the player
      controllerReceiver - the controller receiver of the player used to set the gameController if the player is in a game
      Returns:
      true if the player is successfully logged in, false otherwise

    • createLobby

      public void createLobby(String creator, String lobbyName, int maxPlayerCount, GameControllerReceiver gameReceiver)
      Method that handles the creation of a lobby. It checks the parameters are not null and if the player is logged in, if that is not the case, the player is considered malevolent. If the lobby name is not valid, it sends an error message to the client and re-prompts the joinLobby view. If the lobby name is already taken, it sends an error message to the client and re-prompts the joinLobby view. If the maximum number of players is not valid, it sends an error message to the client and re-prompts the joinLobby view. Otherwise, it creates the lobby, adds the player to the lobby, updates the lightModel with the new lobby and prompts the lobby view. After joining the lobby, the player lightLobbyList is erased.
      Specified by:
      createLobby in interface LobbyGameListsController
      Parameters:
      creator - the nickname of the player creating the lobby
      lobbyName - the name of the lobby
      maxPlayerCount - the maximum number of players that can join the lobby
      gameReceiver - the game controller receiver of the player

    • joinLobby

      public void joinLobby(String joiner, String lobbyName, GameControllerReceiver gameReceiver)
      Method that handles the joining of a lobby. It checks the parameters are not null and if the player is logged in, if that is not the case, the player is considered malevolent. If the lobby name is not valid, it sends an error message to the client and re-prompts the joinLobby view. If the lobby does not exist, it sends an error message to the client and re-prompts the joinLobby view. It adds the player to the lobby, updates the lightModel of the joiner with the new lobby and prompts the lobby view if the lobby is not full, otherwise it starts the game. After joining the lobby, the player lightLobbyList is erased.
      Specified by:
      joinLobby in interface LobbyGameListsController
      Parameters:
      joiner - the nickname of the player joining the lobby
      lobbyName - the name of the lobby to join
      gameReceiver - the game controller receiver of the player

    • leave

      public void leave(String nickname)
      Method that handles the leaving of a player. It checks if the player is in a gameParty, in a lobby or in the lobbyList. Depending on the case, it calls the leave method of the gameController, the leave method of the lobby, and finally it removes the player from the lobbyList.
      Specified by:
      leave in interface LobbyGameListsController
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player leaving

    • leaveLobby

      public void leaveLobby(String leaverNick)
      Method that handles the leaving of a player from a lobby. It checks if the player is in a lobby, if that is not the case, the player is considered malevolent. It removes the player from the lobby calling the removePlayer method of the lobbyController. It logs the leaving of the player and updates the lightModel of the player with the joinLobby view. If the lobby is empty, it removes the lobby from the lobbyMap and notifies the lobbyList mediator of the removal.
      Specified by:
      leaveLobby in interface LobbyGameListsController
      Parameters:
      leaverNick - the nickname of the player leaving the lobby

    • deleteGame

      public void deleteGame(String gameName)
      Method that delete a game from the gameMap.
      Specified by:
      deleteGame in interface GameList
      Parameters:
      gameName - is the name of the game to be removed

    • manageMalevolentPlayer

      public void manageMalevolentPlayer(String player)
      Method that handles the malevolent player, i.e. the players that try to perform actions that are not allowed. It logs the malevolent player on the server and sends an error message to the client.
      Specified by:
      manageMalevolentPlayer in interface MalevolentPlayerManager
      Parameters:
      player - is the nickname of the malevolent player
